creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: two long slender stalks of bamboo grow from the left corner; left of bamboo is a lichen-covered rock; two lines of Chinese running script extend down left side
markings: \'Merely a personal pleasure\' and \'devout layman of the grand surf\', seals, at ULC and lower left side; \'Chang Ch\'iu-ku from old Hang-cho\', in ink at lower left side
title: Autumn Reflections
